title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 202.1 - Reporting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 202.1 - Reporting

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner shall prepare on a quarterly basis a program report for posting on
the department's website. The first report will be due June 30, 2012, and every
three months thereafter. Such report shall include, but not be limited to, the
following: number of applicants; number of participants approved; names of
participants; total amount of projected benefits certified by type of benefit; total number of projected new jobs to be created; number of projected net new
jobs created per participant; aggregate projected new investment in the State; projected new investment per participant; and such other information as the
commissioner determines. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
202.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
